  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientCardStateFormatter
    Formatter that builds an attributed string containing all info regarding the state of a card during VoyageState.
    ClientConstructionStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientConstructionState.
    ClientEndgameStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientEndgameState.
    ClientLargeComponentPrinter
    Formatter that builds a string matrix displaying a large ClientComponent tile.
    ClientLobbyStatesFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientLobbySelectState or ClientSetupState.
    ClientSmallComponentPrinter
    Formatter that builds a string displaying a small ClientComponent tile.
    ClientSpaceShipFormatter
    Formatter that displays an entire ClientSpaceShip, of selected size, and its info.
    ClientStateOverlayFormatter
    Formatter that displays all secondary info of a provided ClientState.
    ClientVerifyStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientVerifyState.
    ClientVoyageStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientVoyageState.
    ClientWaitingRoomStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientWaitingRoomState.
    HelpScreenFormatter
    Formatter that displays the help screen.
    MenuFormatter
    Formatter that displays all pre-connection menu screens.
    TextMessageFormatter
    Formatter that embellishes and displays the last four TUINotification received by the TUIView.
